segments.text: Did your meal meet with your approval ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about a dessert to top off that wonderful meal ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Dessert sounds perfect , but I would like to split something with my friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: On this evening's dessert list , we have chocolate mousse cake , homemade fresh strawberry shortcake , and a spicy rum apple crisp .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that the apple crisp would be wonderful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One dessert will serve two , so would you like to split a second one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We would also like a piece of chocolate mousse cake . Could you bring us four dessert forks , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about some coffee and tea as well ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are all tea drinkers . Please bring us four teas .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will prepare your desserts and have someone bring you your drinks right away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The hot drinks first would be great . Thanks !
segments.speaker: S2
